verses.roman:
samudra-snāna kari' mahāprabhu śīghra āilā
caraṇa pākhāli' prabhu āsane vasilā

synonyms: samudra-snāna—a bath in the sea; kari'-taking; mahāprabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; śīghra—very soon; āilā—returned; caraṇa—feet; pākhāli'-washing; prabhu—Lord Caitanya Mahāprabhu; āsane—on a seat; vasilā—sat.
translation: After bathing in the sea, Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu and His devotees returned very soon. The Lord then washed His feet and sat down on a carpet to take lunch.
